sentences.en: Are you looking to derail this thing before it even gets going?
sentences.cn: 你是想让事情还没开始就搞砸 吗 ?

sentences.en: At least six people were killed and about twenty injured when a train was derailed in an isolated mountain region.
sentences.cn: 火车在一片偏僻的山区脱轨，导致至少六人死亡，约二十人受伤。

sentences.en: Brown is vowing the Saturday night attack will not derail the peace process.
sentences.cn: 布朗表明周六晚的袭击不会对和平进程造成重大影响.

sentences.en: In this paper the evolution of blind equalization algorithms is discussed in derail.
sentences.cn: 引用大量科技文献,阐述了盲均衡算法的发展.

sentences.en: Obfuscation would result in damaging market noise and further derail the real economy.
sentences.cn: 困惑会导致有害的市场噪音,使实体经济进一步偏离轨道.

sentences.en: Opportunistic trades do not have to derail long - time strategies.
sentences.cn: 机会主义式的交易到是没必要脱离 长期 战略.

sentences.en: The present wave of political killings is the work of people trying to derail peace talks.
sentences.cn: 当前的这一系列政治谋杀乃是那些想阻挠和平谈判的人所为。

sentences.en: They argue that a strengthening of the currency would derail their nascent recovery.
sentences.cn: 他们声称,货币升值会阻碍刚刚开始的制造业恢复进程.

sentences.en: They can boost or derail any decision.
sentences.cn: 他们能够促进或推翻任何决定.

sentences.en: Washington's decision to renounce that protocol has threatened to derail it.
sentences.cn: 华府关于退出《京都协定书》的决定已经影响《京都协定书》的执行.

trans.tran_en: if a train derails or something derails it, it goes off the tracks
